statements: SELECT * FROM EducationData WHERE publication_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT researcher_id, research_topic FROM EducationData WHERE institution = 'Example University';
SELECT * FROM EducationData WHERE research_topic LIKE '%machine learning%';
SELECT publication_date, institution FROM EducationData WHERE researcher_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM EducationData ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM EducationData ORDER BY publication_date DESC, researcher_id DESC;
SELECT researcher_id, institution FROM EducationData WHERE publication_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(researcher_id) AS total_researchers, institution FROM EducationData GROUP BY institution HAVING total_researchers > 1 ORDER BY total_researchers DESC;
SELECT research_topic FROM EducationData WHERE institution LIKE '%University%' AND publication_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT researcher_id, publication_date FROM EducationData WHERE researcher_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM education_data WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM education_data WHERE subject = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, student_name, test_score FROM education_data ORDER BY test_score DESC;
SELECT program_name, evaluation_date FROM program_evaluation WHERE program_type = 'Science' ORDER BY evaluation_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(evaluation_id) AS total_evaluations FROM program_evaluation;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM education_data WHERE grade_level > 10 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM education_data WHERE subject = 'Math' AND test_score > 90;
SELECT student_name, grade_level, subject FROM education_data ORDER BY grade_level ASC, student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM program_evaluation WHERE program_type = 'Online' AND effectiveness_score < 0.6;
SELECT program_name, evaluation_date FROM program_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM education_programs;
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM education_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_start_date, program_end_date FROM education_programs ORDER BY program_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, program_start_date, program_end_date FROM education_programs WHERE program_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level BETWEEN 8 AND 10;
SELECT s.student_name, p.program_name FROM students s JOIN program_participation pp ON s.student_id = pp.student_id JOIN education_programs p ON pp.program_id = p.program_id;
SELECT * FROM EducationMetrics;
SELECT program_name, researcher_name FROM EducationMetrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT MAX(achievement_rate) AS max_achievement_rate, MIN(achievement_rate) AS min_achievement_rate FROM ProgramOutcomes;
SELECT program_id, AVG(effectiveness_score) AS avg_effectiveness_score FROM PolicyEvaluation GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT researcher_name, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM EducationMetrics WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM EducationMetrics;
SELECT program_name, researcher_name FROM EducationMetrics WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ProgramOutcomes ORDER BY achievement_rate DESC;

SELECT research_associations.program_id, program_name, policy_id, evaluation_criteria FROM ResearchAssociations JOIN EducationMetrics ON research_associations.researcher_id = educationmetrics.id JOIN PolicyEvaluation ON research_associations.policy_id = policyevaluation.id;
SELECT researcher_name, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM EducationMetrics WHERE researcher_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT name, specialization FROM researchers ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_year, end_year FROM education_programs WHERE end_year > 2023;
SELECT report_id, findings FROM evaluation_reports ORDER BY report_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, name, specialization FROM researchers WHERE specialization = 'Biology';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, r.name as researcher_name FROM research_projects rp JOIN researchers r ON rp.researcher_id = r.researcher_id;
SELECT program_name, description, start_year, end_year FROM education_programs WHERE start_year >= 2018 ORDER BY start_year DESC;
SELECT e.report_id, p.project_name, e.findings FROM evaluation_reports e JOIN research_projects p ON e.project_id = p.project_id WHERE e.evaluation_date >= '2020-01-01';
